data.eml:eml: A new species of Catocala Schrank, 1802 (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae (sensu lato): Erebinae) from Kazakhstan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Kons, Hugo L., Borth, Robert J. (2014): A new species of Catocala Schrank, 1802 (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae (sensu lato): Erebinae) from Kazakhstan. Zootaxa 3866 (4): 543-554, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.4.5
